title: Mid and Jg looking to join a ranked team (Plat 5 and Plat 3)
body:
Hello, me and my friend are looking to join a committed ranked team. We both have previous experience in playing in teams and I've had small amounts of experience shot calling. 

My champ pool can be expanded where necessary but generally what I play is Ahri, Azir, Leblanc, TF and Viktor. The jungler's champ pool is Hecarim, Rek'Sai, Sejuani and Skarner. 

We are both usually available Friday night's, all of Saturday, and all of Sunday(not jungler, he is available Sunday night) 

We can use either Skype or Discord for voice communication if needed. We are also definitely not toxic and will not flame any other members of the team (or opponents). But we will give (and take) constructive criticism so that everyone can improve.

I am currently a Plat 5 mid laner 
-http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ld+wiseman

And my jungler is Plat 3
-http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=beetletank

replies.body:
Hi Guys,

I'm a gold III main support who can off jg.

I was in a very active team last season and we had 3 successful teams ranked Gold V,III, I - however my team is no longer playing, hence why I'm here looking for another team of the same rank who is very active.

I'm very active and have a fantastic attitude - please add me in game if you would like to tea something up.

Cheers,
Johnny

if u need a top laner platinum add me:
contractz

I'd be keen to start something up. Was in a plat ranked team last season and plat in in general last season too. Usually play top/jungle so may be of interest. Due to work am sitting in gold this season but with a team incentive would be keen to climb again. Drop me a friend request if your interested "judaking3". Skype usually my way to go
